casebody.data:
GOLDSTON & Harrington
v.
STATE & Easley. No. 328PA04-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 30, 2006. R. Daniel Boyce, G. Eugene Boyce, Philip R. Isley, Anthony M. Brannon, Raleigh, for Goldston and Harrington. John Maddrey, Norma S. Harrell, Special Deputy Attorney Generals, for State of NC. Pamela B. Cashwell, Jeanette Doran Brooks, for NCICL.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 30th day of March 2006 by NCICL for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Unless already submitted, the Amicus Brief shall be submitted to the court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 28(i). By order of the Court in conference this the 30th day of March 2006."
